Name: The Calming Laser
Description:
Casts a laser beam that freezes enemies.
The longer the casting time, the bigger the beam would be.

Name: The Glowing Confidence
Description:
Speeds you up. Makes you invincible. Paints the tiles you enter.
The louder you shout the spell, the longer the buff would last.

Name: The Burning Passion
Description:
Casts a fireball.
The longer the casting time, the longer the fireball would last.

Name: The Mark of Sincere Words
Description:
Brands the trigger words on the map. 
The branded tiles slow enemies down, and block their bullets.

Name: The Whisper of Love
Description:
Casts a heart that mesmerises an enemy, making it fight for you.
The softer you speak the spell, the longer the buff would last.

Name: The Rainbow of Hope
Description: Fires the trigger words character by character, in rainbow colour.
